pkgmetadata.longdescription: Text Conversion from Nexis Uni PDFs to R Data Frames // Transform 'newswire' and earnings call transcripts as PDF obtained from 'Nexis Uni' to R data frames. Various 'newswires' and 'FairDisclosure' earnings call formats are supported. Further, users can apply several pre-defined dictionaries on the data based on Graffin et al. (2016)doi:10.5465/amj.2013.0288 and Gamache et al. (2015)doi:10.5465/amj.2013.0377.
